jd:
Position: Technical Scrum Master with Healthcare domain (CSM & PSM Certification is must to have)
Location: Remote
Desired years of experience: 9+ Years
Visa required: USC/GC
Don’t disappoint me on this one! No fake candidates, send LinkedIns and documents. , DaVita, minimum 9 months.
Need strong Hospital & healthcare experience in present & Need realtime experience candidate only

This individual will be responsible for:
- Leading multiple projects in developing, integrating and testing cerner applications.
- Supporting and educating the Product Owner, especially with respect to grooming and maintaining the product backlog.
- Removing/ensuring that there are no roadblocks impeding teams from being successful.

We are actively speaking with candidates with a minimum of:
- 5+ years experience as a Technical Scrum Master in an Enterprise Healthcare Environment
- 4+ years leading technical teams in a SAFe Agile Environment
- Technical knowledge surrounding Java and Angular
- Scrum certification (PSM, CSM) required. SAFe Certification Preferred
- Experience with cloud implementations
